refnamediv.refpurpose: Update the current session id with a newly generated one

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
boolsession_regenerate_id booldelete_old_sessionfalse
session_regenerate_id will replace the current session id with a new one, and keep the current session information.
When session.use_trans_sid is enabled, output must be started after session_regenerate_id call. Otherwise, old session ID is used.
